text: aur do oont kee jaati se aur do gaay kee jaati se, kaho, "kya usane donon nar haraam kie hai ya donon maada ko? ya usako jo in donon maada ke pet mein ho? ya, tum upasthit the, jab allaah ne tumhen isaka aadesh diya tha? phir us vyakti se badhakar atyaachaaree kaun hoga jo logon ko pathabhrasht karane ke lie agyaanata-poorvak allaah par jhooth ghade? nishchay hee, allaah atyaachaaree logon ko maarg nahin dikhaata.
